page.title: 18Transport
page.content: Transport is vitally important in rural area.The majority of households have a car but this does not solve the transport problems for everone. Children ,young adults and the aged,in particular ,rely on bus services. Pillerton Priors and Pillerton Hersey have 3 bus sevices into Stratford upon avon and three return on six days of the week provided by the Midland Red Co.There is an early morning and early evening service provided by a private Co. from Oxhill mainly for those working in Stratford upon avon.The same Co.operates a free service to and from Moreton in Marsh on Tuesdays (Market Day).Children in our area are provided with transport to school providing they live more than two miles from school.children less than this distance can be concessionary passengers but parents must pay.
